insert into sim_users (id, username, password, salt, email, activation_code, forgotten_password_code, forgotten_password_time, remember_code, created_on, last_login, active, first_name, last_name, company, phone, customer_id, ip_address) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{forgottenPasswordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{forgottenPasswordTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rememberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{active,jdbcType=BIT}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARBINARY})
mapper.update: update sim_users set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activation_code = #{activationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forgotten_password_code = #{forgottenPasswordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forgotten_password_time = #{forgottenPasswordTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remember_code = #{rememberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_login = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, active = #{active,jdbcType=BIT}, first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ip_address = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, salt, email, activation_code, forgotten_password_code, forgotten_password_time, remember_code, created_on, last_login, active, first_name, last_name, company, phone, customer_id, ip_address from sim_users where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
